replies.body: Now if only OCE had Normal Draft hmmmmmmmmmmm {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I KNOW! Please implement this soon, Riot.{{summoner:6}}
tbh, normals should just be replaced with normals draft world wide, draft just so much better in every way
WHAT! I never knew normal draft even existed wtf why dont we have it?!
they said oce has too little population .0.
That is some bs, Turkey and other regions most likely have smaller populations but they have it as well
I am sure the many OCE players out there who play a lot of normals would freaking upvote this to the moon and back.
Why did they even get rid of it?
WTF riot. You can't fucking be so unfair to 99% of your fucking player base. We're the ones complaining about fucking dynamic que the most so why is it that only higher elo players get everything?
maybe you should just get gud

They may as well just change it back to solo/duo queue. The release of dynamic queue was probably in the top tier of riot fails ever. They are punishing/helping players for being high/low tiered. Up to plat you get used to playing with friends and then... wham only duo till challenger which is now solo. This is probably all a strategy to get players to create smurfs and spend money on rp to unlock the champs they play. Sounds like riot to me.
This is a competitive game, quit bitching and understand that to get further you need to prove it through individual skill. Fek your friends and having fun times with them lol
How are they even being unfair to you? These changes don't even affect you badly and they improve that top 1% fairness
ur trolling right
Aye man, get good and u can be that 1% of that player base so u don't have to be a bitch about shit that Riot post about that "1%"{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
well since im a silver scrub none of this affect me {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Why does Riot have a Sydney Campus if OCE is being overlooked? NA, EU and all the rest are not the only ones trying to climb! #ballsoutforOCE

Wouldn't it be nice if Autofill was an option that you could choose to turn on? I don't really care about my queue times because I just watch YouTube while I'm waiting and its just not worth waiting for even a far shorter queue if i'm likely to get support.
im with you there! i would much prefer to wait 30 - 45 mins to play a role that i enjoy than having an instapop queue where i have to play a role i have no idea about. {{champion:56}} FTW!

Dynamic queue sucks because of the amount of players smurfing to boost their friends. Ranked this year has been cancer. Every game is just a stomp. Low ranked players have virtually no effect on the game.

Ranked in general this season sucked I personally enjoyed been able to pair with more friends but this also lead to having the enemy team who obviously play together more winning hands down. In saying this quing as a 4 does not mean make us vs a full 5 man premade. I think this at lower ranks should be restricted to trios only and still have a team que
hey riot, why is it so hard to get a key fragment after 10 won games
get a S- or better

key fragment drop rates decrease over a certain period of time like a month or so, but they reset. it's a way of making people who dont play too often can still get the fragments and people who play heaps will only get about the same amount. It's just another way of Rito incentives to get people to pay for skins rather than to play for them.
DAMN RIOT{{summoner:21}} {{item:3157}} {{champion:6}}

hmm, highly prefer everyone to have the same rules for even competition. personally im not a fan of dynamic que and barely play now because of it. too many got carried into higher elos that they are not good enough to play at which makes the game un-enjoyable for below diamond elo players
Is there a reason why i have auto fill activated even though i'm in my promos ._.?

There's still no system in place to maintain competitive integrity in ranked when it comes to a player's computer/network's competency. Kids flood ranked after school and they don't even check their internet beforehand.

I've said it time and time again. There needs to be a 3-step check before players are allowed to queue up. Ping test to check for connection speed and/or packet loss, thorough game file check, and computer stability test.

You can make all the changes to Ranked in the world, but if a player decides to play with 300ms ping we're all fucked.
{{champion:81}}
